summary.para: Updates the specific resource texture inside the specific range or box using the supplied data.

param.name: minimumExtents
param.para: The "left" extent of the updates if specified; if NULL, the entire texture is updated.

param.name: maximimumExtents
param.para: The "right" extent of the updates if specified; if NULL, the entire texture is updated.

param.name: strides
param.para: The stride to advance through the input data, according to dimension.

param.name: dimensions
param.para: The number of dimensions in the resource texture. This must match the number used to load the texture.

param.name: data
param.para: The data to be placed into the resource texture.

param.name: dataCount
param.para: The size of the data buffer to be used to update the resource texture.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

item.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

remarks.para: The number of dimensions in the update must match those of the created texture.
